reviews.reviewText: Chair is less than 4 months old, seams are tearing + metal frame wore a hole into material, Cheaply made I guess because reading other reviews this is an issue. 100% would NOT recommend. The chair we got for $50 from Walmart lasted 5+ years. Definitely would not waste your hard earned money on this junk.
My godson is extremely happy to have this item. He never imagined having one especially with speakers!!!

I bought this as a gift for my fiance and he seems to love it. The volume goes super loud and the audio is good quality. I gave it 4 stars because the speaker on the side stopped working and we were unable to connect it to the Xbox for a couple weeks, but it randomly started working again. We had only had it for a few months at that point.
Easy to setup just 2 attachment... sounds great, just make sure to keep volume at the suggested volume. My son is 10 and loves it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Weird curve for back. Tends to hurt
reviews.reviewText: All I wish is the curve of the chair be a little wider. It can put pain on the back in less than an hour. However, the speaker is awesome. Rocking it can naturally blow air on your neck. And good for music vibing

reviews.reviewTitle: My son loves the chair but..
reviews.reviewText: "He was a little disappointed when it took only 2 months for it to completely rip along the seam from just sitting on he doesnt stand on it he doesnt do anything besides sit and lay back and it was very poorly held together at that point."

These were bought around Christmas time for my son and daughter we were so excited after three months the front of the chair emerged something that tore through the fabric such a disappointment it cut my daughters arm the chairs look awesome but in three months they should not be falling apart like this
My son uses this as a gaming chair and he loves it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fabric tore from bracket after first week and stiches stretched from 100 lb kid after a week
reviews.reviewText: Fabric tore from bracket after first week and stiches stretched from 100 lb kid after a week.  I can send back but smazon charges restocking fee of 20 dollars.  Decided to live with tears and threading coming undone because id rather not lose another 20.  It is comfy and speakers work good.  Im not sure how long it will last though
Got this for my daughter for Christmas. She loves it. The speaker in it is awesome. It rocks!!!!
"Comfortable. Ive had it for few months now, use it almost every day, and it still looks and feels new. Very satisfied"
Myself I loved the chairs for my grandkids. They are comfortable and fun.

Its Okay however the only negative thing I don’t like about the Bluetooth is that after about 10 minutes into gameplay,  the Bluetooth stops working. Then you have to turn it on again to reset it. No armrest is another disappointment as far as comfort is concern. Otherwise it sounds good for your gaming.
"The material is not very durable. The thread is already messing up, and its only 6 weeks old."

reviews.reviewTitle: Ripped right out of the box. BIG DISAPPOINTED!
reviews.reviewText: "It had a hole in the  chair as soon as we took it out of the box. The blue tooth was easy enough to hook up and the sound was pretty good. I honestly  wished I spent some more money and got a better quality chair.  It seems like the chairs  on amazon that looked nice and very comfortable didnt  have speakers in them . It was even harder to find one with  Blue tooth in the chair.  The selection seemed rather  small and there wasnt that many reviews  to help you out. In my case my son has special  needs and has a disability  called Pica. It means he eats in edible objects. On the top of his list is Cotton. So you can imagine this wasnt  something that I would take a chance on after  spending  110.00 . I knew it wasnt  coming in the  original box  but was still considered new.  Since it was heavy  there  was no way  I was lugging it to a UPS  store to get the full refund. If anyone  has a suggestion  on how to safley patch the chair so my son can get some use out of it please  let me know by emailing  me at joshmom1@gmail.com"
Grandson loves it
Made great no issues son has used it for over 3 months now

reviews.reviewTitle: Parts were missing to use the bluetooth component
reviews.reviewText: I did not receive all of the components for the bluetooth capability. The item listed in the booklet as B1 - 3m 3.5mm to 3.5mm Audio cable is missing. I did receive the power supply cable. My grandson can not use the bluetooth component if he does not have all of the equipment.  I was very disappointed with this purchase.

Arrived promptly. Was well protected in plastic.  No styrofoam.  Worked immediately out of box.  Used for Nintendo switch and got sounds right away with provided cords.  Then, worked perfectly pairing with phone and iPad using Bluetooth for both.  My 11 year old loves it.
Got  this for my son for Christmas and he absolutely loves it very comfortable and sounds great
They never worked and it is really heavy
8 year old rates it a 10+
Grandson loves this chair it is perfect for his gaming. Speakers get loud if that’s what you like. It is comfy

When we opened the box we noticed the seems had already started losing the stitching. When trying to connect it to out gaming system the speakers wouldn’t work. Had to return and ended up getting a different chair.

"Would give it five stars except that about a week in, some sort of inside structure was snapped off and now a large piece of some kind is loose in the very front of the chair. Honestly though, it definitely doesnt impact the comfort this chair offers, even for someone who is 511 1/2. I can use this chair for 8 hours straight a month after i bought and still feels as good as it did the first time. Highly recommend!"

I have to say I’m genuinely shocked how great the sound is from the speakers.. there’s a control button for the bass and volume right on the side so it can be done without looking. And it’s super comfy. My son loves it! Very easy to set up!

reviews.reviewTitle: sound is good but comfort is zero
reviews.reviewText: Bought this gaming chair as a present for my boyfriend for christmas, 4 days into using it, the chair became uncomfortable and worn down. There is a board that can be felt underneith in when sitting, and it almost needs to be propped up in front just to make it tollerable. I expexted a bit more for being a not-so cheap chair but highly dissapointed in the overall comfort level. Sound quality is perfect and exactly as described but does no good if you cant sit in it for more than a half hour to enjoy. feels like i wasted my money on a same quality cheap chair
All good except lack of foam has you feeling the wood framing before long. Latch that lock hinge shut is not robust. Pretty good otherwise.
Bought for my daughter. She is not a gamer but just wanted it to sit and watch tv and play her music. Great chair.

reviews.reviewTitle: Seems like a pretty good chair
reviews.reviewText: The chair itself is fine. The cord that goes into the chair to the t.v. however came in bent on the end that goes in the chair and is unusable so that is a problem. Without that cord its not much of a gaming chair, I would recomend buying an xtra cord when buying this chair. My grandson was dissapointed that he could hook it up on Christmas Day.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great chair, stitching already falling apart
reviews.reviewText: Got two of these as Christmas presents for both our sons. They absolutely loved it. One they were hooked up the the audio they loved it even more, and they will spend all day on these if we let them., Only downside is that we are barely over a few weeks in and stitching is already falling apart. Hoping it doesn’t get much worse than this and we can fully enjoy these for awhile.

reviews.reviewTitle: Right side head speaker does not work
reviews.reviewText: The speaker on the right side does not work
Large, comfy, solid, sounds great, and everything worked like it was supposed to. My son LOVES it so that pretty much sums it up for me. Well worth the $110 it was on sale for.
Heavy duty- no fuss assembly!
Go for my teen boys. They love it!

So angry about this chair. Got it as a Christmas gift from "Santa" and the thing is complete garbage. Stopped working after one day, glitches out and won\t connect properly. Son is in tears, Christmas ruined and I\m so upset! DO NOT PURCHASE
Great chair. Perfect for my son and even my husband can sit in it and is comfortable

We bought this chair for my son, who’s an avid gamer.  He says it’s the best one yet.  He’s 11 years old, and it’s the perfect size for him.  I’m 5’11” and can sit in this, but it’s not the most comfortable for a 200lbs adult.  It’s very sturdy, and seems to be made of high end product.  Definitely recommend for the teenager in your life.

I ordered this as a temporary gaming chair for my 9yo. This is probably the best I’ve bought in my own gaming career. The comfort is amazing, and the embedded speakers are beyond what I expected for the price. It even shipped faster than Amazon quoted! This is a great value, and I definitely recommend.

"Its heavy as hell. Definitely sturdy. Bought this since my wife has given my play room to the kids and first thing she took out - after me - was the couch. Feels very sturdy, its frame is pretty heavy to move around. I wish it had a better lumbar support but except that works pretty well. Also the kids love it. Didnt get the chance to try the sound sys yet"

"  Its heavy as hell. Definitely sturdy. Bought this since my wife has given my play room to the kids and first thing she took out - after me - was the couch. Feels very sturdy, its frame is pretty heavy to move around. I wish it had a better lumbar support but except that works pretty well. Also the kids love it. Didnt get the chance to try the sound sys yet"
Really great, comfortable, easy to use and folds up when not in use.
Really great, comfortable, easy to use and folds up when not in use.
Very comfortable can use for other things too
Very comfortable can use for other things too
Great product.
Great product.
"  pretty sweet crisp sound. Easy to connect  and its comfortable. Though this is coming from a guy who used to sit on the floir to game. Either way Im a happy camper."
My son really loves this chair. It is very good quality and very comfortable.
My son really loves this chair. It is very good quality and very comfortable.
Very nice

Can connect to PS4 via Bluetooth.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not what I was hoping for
reviews.reviewText: "  I liked that it was able to rock and be moved easily but the powersupply in the bottom isnt actually attacked to anything and if its smashed around it will eventually break. Also after about 2 months of use the seat wore down to the point I couldnt sit cross legged any more because of a solid bar at the front of the chair that kept cutting off my circulation. If it was used for gaming on a large TV and not a computer on a floor table im sure this would be amazing if just wasnt what I was looking for."

I purchased the chair as a birthday gift for my grandson (12 years old). I had it shipped directly to him in another state. It arrived in perfect condition. He loves the chair. I purchased it mostly for gamming; however, he sits on it during his virtual school classes. Very pleased with my purchase.
Good job on how you are doing today is the hot and let me if you need my recommendation s.

It’s a great chair aesthetically, but I had to send it back as it was unusable with my fiancé’s newer gaming systems unless you purchased all sorts of adaptors. For the money I spent on it, you would think it would work with new systems.
I wish my son liked it more. It’s really heavy and a pain to more out of the way. It already has a hole in the seam.
Grandson loves it
"  Goes perfect in my sons room, the red outline lights up and the speakers are loud."

Bluetooth refuses to connect and this just became a very expensive piece of worthless furniture instead of the gaming chair I had In mind for my son.  We even bought a separate receiver to attach to the tv to try and get it to work.  It will connect to a phone and play music, so I  know it kind of works, but we have tried everything to connect it to the tv but it never works. I dont Even know how to return something this big...
This chair ISNT WORKING I NEED A REFUND
Awesome

reviews.reviewTitle: The speakers are loud which is a good thing.
reviews.reviewText: Thank you. My grandson loves it. The speakers sound like surround sound. It can get very loud which is great. He can also connect his phone. I love it.
My son loves this chair. It’s comfy and great for gaming
"  The reason I bought this chair was for the speakers and what a disappointment. On the highest volume you could hardly hear it, definitely could not feel vibrations, so whats the point? Returned."
Just great

My 14 y/o loved it! No issues with mine! Box was a little banged up when it arrived but no issues with the actual chair. We didnt set up the speakers but that wasnt a necessity for him. He’s uses his headphones more often anyway.
'xa0Connects very easy via bluetooth to TV. Sound is amazing. Comfortable. Leather is soft and looks very classy. My son loves it.
"  sounds great doesnt turn after 5 uses trying new ac adapter"
A bit overpriced. Small delay in sound sync with tv. Uncomfortable crossbar at end of seat.
My husband is IN LOVE with this chair... So far so good.....

My 13 year old first bought the  "Rocker Pro Series H3 Black Leather Vibrating Floor Video Gaming Chair with Headrest for Adult, Teen, and Kid Gamers - 4.1 High Tech Audio and Wireless Capacity - Foldable and Ergonomic Back Support" but returned it because it was not comfortable for him.  He then chose this chair and has kept it.  While this chair does not have arms like the other chair, and while it looks more basic, ultimately NOT having a vibrating piece in the seat and not having a padded head rest that sticks out was more comfortable for him.  As an adult I found the other chair more comfortable EXCEPT for the vibrating piece.  If it were not for the vibrating piece sticking into your back, the other chair would be more comfortable.  Therefore, even though this chair doesn't look as nice and doesn't have arm rests, it is ultimately more comfortable.  Sound and ease of use is similar for both.  They hook up to XBox easily and sound is fine.
Looks cool, comfortable, but can easily get broken. Not that durable.
The quality of sound was very shocking to my ears. Very comfy with my seat cushion , I’m 6 ft 195 and fit on here great, if I was a little shorter it’d be perfect seating

So I wanted to apologize about everything I said about this chair. It was an absolutely great purchase! I have five kids and one of them had hid the instructions. I found them this morning! This is the legit the best chair on the market! It lights up and the base is booming! My whole house is rocking and  my son loves it!! And so do I!
love the chair....we have 2

reviews.reviewTitle: Amazon is declining in its quality.
reviews.reviewText: This was supposed to be a birthday gift.  Chair came with NO accessories!  It doesn’t even have a power adapter.  It was supposed to come with all the needed accessories.  Amazon’s standards are dropping.  They don’t care what they ship anymore.  I have spent thousands at amazon via personal and company needs.  It is starting to leave a bad taste in my mouth.  Kind of like apple products (used to have higher quality products and customer care).
"  Rockin! This thing is awesome. Feels like being in a game cafe or old school arcade. When you sit in it, you know youre in the game chair. I already want another one!"

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect for small to average build gamers
reviews.reviewText: "  Its an ok chair. Unfortunately, this may not be suitable for someone whos over 6 foot and 200lbs. One with a pedestal would be better suited. The sound quality is fair and it requires no assembly. It would be perfect for a teen or pre teen."
Great

"  We got two of these.. one for my husband and one for my son. These are sturdy and heavy. Really, really solid. Nice stiff padding. My husband doesnt like the hole area on the back, but he uses this every day for gaming so he can sit properly with his legs and not hurt himself. My son loves his too. We were really happy with the quality. I can see these things lasting for a LONG time."

"  Comfort and sturdiness are amazing. I can sit in it for about 10 hours (alternating breaks from time to time) and its pretty sturdy, doesnt move much, or scuff up my wooden floors. I dont use it for gaming so I dont know how well the stereos and stuff works. But its worth the money. Easy setup from the box: take it out, connect the hinges and its ready (dont forget to plug it in). :)"
Four starts because the chair should have come with updated HDMI audio converter for newer consuls.

"  I thought I wouldnt like this chair so much due to it being so low to the ground, but its very comfortable and isnt terrible getting up and down from.  Some of the reviews complained about back pain, but I havent experienced that.  But Im not in it for hours at a time either.  Speaker setup could use some work, especially since you need to run cables for gaming consoles, but I find them more useful for a mobile device, since the TVs sound is better."

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice looking, great audio but no comfort
reviews.reviewText: "  Great looking chair, audio and inputs are nice but almost no good padding to keep you comfortable. I can actually feel the wood frame sitting on it. Had to use pillows for comfort. And if youre tall like me, the chair is small."
I purchased this for my 11-year-old grandson he said it’s very comfortable and he loves it
"  I love this chair , got it for my 5 year old and its something that he will grow into ,"

reviews.reviewTitle: Felt apart after less than 6 months, pictures attached
reviews.reviewText: Giving 2 stars out of kindness - it works ok on the beginning but completely felt apart after less than 6 months of use (and I’m not even that heavy or tall, about 170lbs and 5’9). The back of the seat teared apart in 4 different spots (pictures attached).
"  the material is really stretching squeeking sounding. its not the most comfortable. one of my favorite features though is hooking up my cell phone and playing music. it gets pretty loud."

Purchased for my grandson, he likes it, but we are unable to Bluetooth to his PS4., Not sure if I would buy again, unable to Bluetooth to his gaming system., Only time will tell how it holds up otherwise, will update in the future.

reviews.reviewTitle: Comfort and Sound Quality are the Best.
reviews.reviewText: Upgraded from a previous X-Rocker model from like 6 year ago, so with that in mind, the comfort is great! Sits a tad higher than the old chair and is a bit wider, too. The upholstery, tho it looks sharp, doesn’t feel as sturdy as the old one, especially when getting in and out of the sim cockpit. Well see how it lasts!, The sound system is pretty greet. The bass is responsible and where it’s built into the seat, you really feel it depending on what game you’re playing. CON: while easy to set up and pair the Bluetooth and it’s a Good addition, but not sure if it’s a windows thing or the Bluetooth internal stuff that’s causing this but when paired with the pc, there’s a small pop before and after a sound occurs. Haven’t seen if that’s the same it paired with another device., Hardest part was getting the darned pin in to secure the seat from closing. But it’s in and looks sharp in my sim cockpit. Adds a bit of style to the room and truly makes you feel like a boss.

reviews.reviewTitle: I like it my first gaming chair!
reviews.reviewText: Although PS4 isnt conn2cting thru bluetooth but its not an issue i connected it thru my controller which ended up good so i can use the speaker and base are ok not the best but is ok. Pairing is easy assembly is just flip it and put the pin. Operation is on off switch and a dial for volume and a switch for bluetooth and aux. All in all i like it

Bought this for my son so he had play on Fortnite., He loves the comfort and loves to Bluetooth to his phone so he can listen to his music while playing., I have already had to get after him for his music being too loud.
"  I only knocked it down to 4 because it isnt truly wireless, must be plugged into an outlet. Sounds is great though."

reviews.reviewTitle: You get More for your money!!
reviews.reviewText: I want to give a Thumbs up to Amazon for the next  day delivery verses 8day..Very well package set up in min.The manufactured supplied additional sound jack cords and adaptors. Surround Sound was great with bluetooth. I forgot my grandson had Nintendo Switch which is not compatible for sound connections only XBox it says. Great for my 14yr old who is very tall.

I loved the gamer chair as a birthday gift, it very good quality and I can actually feel the bass when I am in a match but I don’t think I don’t dislike it at all it’s also very comfy. my mom and my sister like it it’s like a movie chair.
"  This chair is so comfortable I havent had the chance to play my video games with the chair. But so far I love it and Im gonna buy a second chair when I get the chance."
This was a great investment. Furniture can hurt my body, but this absolutely assists with my back pain! Thank you!
Great buy!

We bought this chair for our son for Christmas. Here we are 3 months later and the cement piece that keeps it weighted dow, and allows the chair to rock completely ripped the bottom of the chair and fell out, causing our sons floor to be ruined. All the staples used to keep the lining on the bottom of the chair are coming off too.
My son loves this chair he went crazy! Definitely would by again. Sound is amazing as well!
"  My husband loves it hasnt left the chair for 4 hrs 😂😂"
My 8 year loves this chair!!!!
Grandson loves it.
My kids loved it, they use it for gaming, watching movies or even to just relax.
"  Great for my kids, they loved them. Makes gaming really fun for them and friends."
"  The chair makes noises from the material used. Its a sturdy chair, the speaker system is iffy at best."
Value for money

reviews.reviewTitle: Goodbye and great value for the price
reviews.reviewText: VerySturdy chair my grandson uses it for watching TV gaming many other things
REALLY FUN
My son loves his rocker . It’s has nice volume and is sturdy . He is 5 and weighs about 55lbs.
Ny 6 year old loved it and feels like a true gamer
Grandson loved it
Kids love it
This was a Christmas gift for a 17 year old and he loves it. The negative side is Dad fights him for it.
Comfortable, great sound, well made, heavy - purchased this for my son for Christmas and he loves it.
My son loves it and it’s big enough for adults too! Would buy again ! We get so many compliments.
We were happy with the chair at first, but after a few times using it the aux input ports broke.
Son loves this chair.  Only drawback is that it has to be plugged in all the time for speakers to work, no battery option

Not as comfortable but it is sturdy
Overall good product for my 10 year old son.
My son loves it!

Bought this chair for my son for Christmas. It was great the first week, then it stopped sitting upright. Attempted to contact the manufacturer, got no where so decided to return the product. Returning the product is an even worse headache. Save yourself the trouble.
My grandson loves it
Love this product

We bought two of these. After just three days of use, one of the chairs had a giant block of concrete fall out of the bottom of it. My husband rigged it back up for use because we felt like it would be too much trouble to ship back.
Nice chair🤘🏼 Son loves it. Sounds auwsome!
My son loves this chair.  Bluetooth and audio jacks available and sturdy.  I was expecting a light little chair, but this thing is substantial.  I am impressed.
Great chair overall - only complaint is it doesn’t recline well.

Bought this chair for my son who seeks motion movement. He likes to rock back and forth a lot because he suffered a traumatic brain injury as a baby. The chair is super heavy and it to heavy for him to rock. I can barley rock it myself and I weigh 130 pounds. The back is hard so not very comfortable to sit in. If it wouldn’t be such a hassle to return then I would have returned it.
Great price for a great product

reviews.reviewTitle: A real hit for my 10 year old grandson.
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my grandson for Christmas .  He loves to play forte night and it was the perfect gift.  Well made and connections on the chair great.
My son love the comfort of his chair and the capability of listening to music on it!!

I like it for the looks and comfort. Christmas gift for my 12yr old grandson who absolutely loved it!!! I had ordered things to make his xbox with it but never received them. Found out they never completed my order!  😡
We bought it for our son for Christmas & loves it.
"  Its a nice chair but its not compatible with ps4."

"  Great for a teenage boy. Charges pretty easy. Wont hold a charge though."
I bought this for my grandchild and he loved it!  It is very sturdy, and the sound was awesome.
Worth the money...the speakers in the headrest work awesome...gotta tell my son to turn it down all the time
Great sound!
Should be taller and sound quality should be improved
The sound is amazing.  My son loves it for gaming and even his music.

reviews.reviewTitle: As described, very pleased with this gaming chair
reviews.reviewText: I was pleased at how quickly this item arrived. It was a gift for my nephew, and he loves it!!
Purchase as a Christmas gift for my twin eight-year-old boys, they love them and enjoys fortnight more

The chair needs 4 auxiliary cords.. it only came with a red, white and green cord. In the instruction manual to hook it up to a gaming system (Xbox 1) you need a yellow cord.. why didn’t it come with the correct cords? This was a Christmas gift for my son and now we are trying to hook it up to his Xbox and we don’t have the cord we need to use it
Perfect gift
Sound quality is great. The chair is comfortable. We bought it for my son and he is 184 pounds. He plays for hours and stays comfortable.
Son loves it.  Built better than expected.
Other than a stitch hanging on front of chair,  it is a great chair.
Love that they fold. Came fully assembled. Got two of these for my sons for Christmas. They love them. Great sound. Great bass. Definitely a good buy

"  I Purchased these gaming chairs for my grandsons and they are fabulous.  The speakers are loud with plenty of bass and we are all impressed.  Great value for the money.  Cant go wrong with these chairs.  Oh and since the are adults size the boys can grow into them and their dad can join in on the fun.  From the look on their dads face hes just as excited."

The product was too low ro the ground, i didnr mind it much .... But when i seen the product couldnt be modified with atool and arns
"  Got it for my grandson hes 8 loves it"
Love everything about it.. The speakers are amazing also.

"  Its very comfy, the speakers arent very loud but I didnt really buy it for the speakers. It isnt flimsy and is kinda heavy folds for easy storage and came with all the cords you would need for using the speakers. I will update further if it breaks."
Great sound and comfortable
I needed to so many other things and then I just didn’t get my refund back for things that I did buy and still trying to get a refund back for the chair

reviews.reviewTitle: If he loved it I’m happy!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my grandsons birthday! He loved it!!!
Disappointed that it doesn’t Bluetooth to PS4 that’s the whole reason we bought it.  Even though it said it did.  False advertising,
Really hard to play in this chair. Falls alot. Super heavy.
Chair is nicely built for 100 something, but the quality of the audio, and the controls for the audio are very cheap. I’ll be looking to upgrade the audio. Overall 4 stars
"  Just received it and first impressions are that its really cool!!!  Has all kinds of speakers in it, but I bought it just as a chair to play games.  I like it so far."

reviews.reviewTitle: Not the best quality. Seem ripped already not even a year old.
reviews.reviewText: Thought this was a good product but hooking up wires was very difficult. Needed all sorts of adapters and the directions were useless unless you have a brand new tv I guess.  Couldn’t figure out how to get sound to come from the chair without unplugging hdmi from the gaming unit there’s only one hdmi port it was difficult needless to say. Furthermore I bought them for Christmas 2018 and the stitching wear your butt goes is already torn.  Yes my son is 7 so he’s not the easiest on the chair but again he’s 7 so his Wright alone from rocking shouldn’t have done this in 6 months.  That’s pretty ridiculous to me.

"  I ordered 2 of these for our game room. My teen son and his friends love them. The quality seems good thus far as numerous people have stated they were comfortable and fallen asleep in them. The sound quality is very good as they are clear and pretty loud. They have only been connected via bluetooth to musical devices so I cant attest to video games. No issues and overall I do recommend."
"  He loved everything about it. The volume button glows blue. It comes with a battery pack. Its sturdy and comfortable. I would definitely recommend this well made product."

Im a 6'4" 190lb guy and this chair fits me just fine. I have an xbox one x and I knew I was going to have to buy the adapter before I purchased the chair. Received the adapter and now the chair rocks out when I play. Great sound and unless you just want a chair, well worth getting the adapter.

The chair is great, our son loves it. Unfortunately the cords are cheap, and both the av cord and the power cord snapped connectors off already within a months use. Pretty disappointed to have to shell out more money to buy these connectors again.

reviews.reviewTitle: Big enough for my 6 foot son home from the air force!
reviews.reviewText: Awesome and glad I chose this one chair over “a pair” of lesser chairs.

"  I bought this for this son.  I didnt think he would like it as much as he did - I just wanted him to stop wearing out the couch.  The bluetooth feature is great.  I sat it in and its comfortable - love how the back is high enough to support the head."

reviews.reviewTitle: Really just useful as a chair
reviews.reviewText: Not worth it. Hard to hook up and you need to buy extra wires. Comfortable though.
Thank you amazon for the no hassle return. Speakers failed after 1 month of light use.
Great quality

Son (age 11) was absolutely thrilled with this Christmas gift! Uses it with his Xbox One. Did try to use just green cable as I seen noted in Questions but it did not work for us.  Not sure if I missed something but I also read about needing HDMI splitter cables and an HDMI to RCA cable, so I ordered them and had them ready.  Did take a little bit to figure the hook up all out.  The cords that come with rocker were wrapped tightly in tape and husband went to cut the tape and wound up cutting the red plug so we only have one side for audio right now but we have additional cables somewhere in house just a matter of finding.
Nice looking seat and fairly comfortable for my 11 year old. However the chair started making very loud creaking noises after a week. Keeping because my son likes it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great chair but you need adapter for PS4
reviews.reviewText: WE got this for my son for Christmas as part of his room makeover to incorporate a “gamer cave.” He LOVES this chair and so do his dad and I. The sound is pretty awesome, it easily connects to his iPad and lets his headphones plug in. It DOES come with a power cable so you don’t need an aftermarket one, however, I was unsure from reviews but it does NOT connect to the PS4 wirelessly without the transmitter. PS4 doesn’t allow Bluetooth audio connections. We could connect it with a cable but who wants a cable draped across the room??  So another $40+ later we haventhe wireless adapter which actually connects to the TV which is even better as it can then be used when watching movies or whatever.  It’s a sturdy chair that’s comfortable and well made. We are very happy with the purchase!

reviews.reviewTitle: Good quality chair, if I can get it to connect
reviews.reviewText: Quality of chair looks great. My son is 5'10" , 165lbs and he says the chair is very comfortable.  Haven't been able to hook it up to his Xbox one yet. I will do more research and add to this review.
The sound quality is great, kids love it.

X Rocker makes very poor quality chairs. We bought it as a Christmas present. It showed up with broken plastic, which I repaired. In less than 4 months the seat seams ripped and more plastic broke. Our child is only 9 and just sat in it. It wasn’t mishandled. One Christmas later and it’s gone; went to the dump months ago.
We are watching TV through the seat! The sound is better than the TV!! Had it unpacked and installed in seconds!  Son absolutely loves it!
After just three months chair lost all padding in chair
Very comfortable
"  It is bulky but comfortable. Since it folds up it is easy to store! The speakers work very well, I dont use them much."
Doesnt connect to PS4 wirelessly. Sound is terrible

reviews.reviewTitle: The chair itself is cool BUT do not expect to be able to hook ...
reviews.reviewText: The chair itself is cool BUT do not expect to be able to hook it up to anything, we could never get the bluetooth to work, we even followed others tips but NOTHING, NADA!

reviews.reviewTitle: We loved it - Until the power connector stopped working
reviews.reviewText: "  Got this for our 11 year old son for Christmas and it was a hit.  Really nice chair, not too complicated to set up and the sound is pretty amazing.  He was thrilled.  We were disappointed that it doesnt automatically work with XBOX and other consoles but we knew that when we purchased it.  Fast forward 5 months - the chair wont power on.  We found that there is something wrong internally where the male power piece is inserted into the chair because we can get it to work if we push down on the connector hard once it has been inserted.  The chair has never been moved from that spot in the room and the wire was never tripped over or had any similar trauma to have caused this.  Disappointed."
Both my boys loved their new chairs
Not nearly as practical as you would hope. The electrical plug is way too short and it cannot easily be connected to the Xbox. Better off buying a regular gaming chair.

reviews.reviewTitle: The concept is just awesome and I really enjoy how immersive this chair can ...
reviews.reviewText: It does exactly what it says: connectivity to your PS4., The concept is just awesome and I really enjoy how immersive this chair can turn your videogames parties ! Gran Turismo, Ratchet and Clank, Crash Bandicoot, FIFA... all games are enhanced thanks to this surround audio system and the low seat. I am typically that guy that could not play its best game on the sofa so I sat on the floor. But now with this low seat I have found my perfect spot to play videogames and I will never trade my spot ! In addition I rediscovered the pleasure to watch movies and series., To be honest, I prefer to put the headphones on my PS4 controller rather than directly on the chair when I am using it and do not want to wake up the entire house for a sound quality reason., I think it provides a true comfort to connect wireless the chair through the PS4 wireless controller (no cables through the room) except the power cord of the chair + the jack/jack between the PS4 dualshock and the X Rocker. My recommendation is to use your PS4 to watch Netflix, DVDs, Blurays as well to optimize your experience of the product. For shows that do not require a low seat and a certain quality of sound, it is just like giving pizza to birds: it works but it does not worth it., For a wireless experience with any model of Xbox, Playstation or any home consoles: Ace Bayou wireless retrofit system is to be ordered separately ($35 to $55 before taxes), otherwise, the cables will do the trick just fine., + The immersive experience videogames/Netflix/DVD, + Wireless works well with PS4, + Ideal for low seat gamers, + Easy to store (foldable), - The cable management is a total mess if not using a PS4 or the separate retrofit system (adapter to be purchased for Xbox one controller), - The sound quality with the headphones is disappointing when plugged onto the chair, - Fabric is kind of fragile so if you intend to play shirtless in the middle of summer, put a bath towel on the chair before you sit
"  Best chair ever. Highly recommend it. Speakers get super loud and the material is great. I bought two and my family loves it"

"  Well.  less than 60 days in burning smell and short circuit I guess.  Doesnt power on.  tried several know good 9v 2a adapters and nothing.", Their customer service@acecasual has not responded yet for a replacement.  Beware and know you are getting something cheaply made.  Especially something like this which will get abused most likely (gaming chair) should be built with super tough components and such.

Im truly happy with it and Im glad I purchased it."

I won’t be using the blu tooth speaker that much but I couldn’t believe how clear it is.  Verry smooth sounding subwoofer.  It is nice to know I have the option.  I would reccomend this chair to any adult or kid.  Tottaly worth the money.  I did my searching and conparing before buying.  The $30-50 Walmart-Target models just can’t compare!

He's 5' 11" and the chair fits him perfectly. I like that it folds away so when it's not in use I can put it away. It is on the heavy side, but that wasn't a deal breaker for me.

It is heavy however, so if you have to move it from one story of the house to another, you may wonder why they dont use a lighter wieght frame.(??), Speakers are "ok" they do get alot of popping and crackling and some humming..but overall a nice rocker for your gaming experience!

reviews.reviewTitle: Best thing i have bought in 2017 so far....
reviews.reviewText: Bought mine used-like new through amazon prime. I never owned a gaming chair and didnt feel like spending a fortune on a gaming chair,after some good research i landed on this one. I went through some reviews and found that this chair had some good reviews on it so i gave it a try as an early January birthday gift. Package was huge and came quickly. It came with everything that i was looking for to easily plug in the chair through the audio jack in the tv and bluetooth to listen to music to on my iphone and of course the ac plug.  Now playing Driveclub on my Ps4 or Forza on my Xbox One will never feel the same. With the volume even at 25% its loud enough to feel like i have a racetrack in my house as my neighbors have said. I have been gaming since 1998 when i was 4. This is easily the best thing that i have bought in a while.  I just bought Driveclub VR for my PS VR and a Thrustmaster T150 racing wheel. I cant wait to try them all! You cant get more immersive than this!
Excellent in every way. Fast delivery and top rated quality!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great chair once you get the needed converter for most new gen systems.
reviews.reviewText: Great gaming chair and comfortable for the price. I knocked it down a star bc it will not work out of the box with XBox 1 (or any other gaming systems that has HDMI connection). You need to get a HDMI to HDMI/Audio converter in order to get the sound to work (HDMI from Xbox to converter, then HDMI from converter to TV, and then the supplied audio cables from chair to converter). Sound is great and not too loud, even when turned up all the way. My 7 yr old son loves it...and I find it comfortable as well (5'8", 170 lbs)., Overall happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great quality and the Sound is awesome
reviews.reviewText: My son got this chair for Christmas he loves it. Great quality and the Sound is awesome.
"  The directions for connecting to the TV/video game system are completely inaccurate. I still havent figured out how to set it up correctly."

reviews.reviewTitle: The chair is very nice, but the plug is cheaply made and broke ...

Bought this for my Brother in Law. He loves it and uses it regularly with no issues.

Mind you, my then 13 year old for whom the chair was purchased has used it with no mercy :) He has used it as a pillow, rocked back and forth, overall used it like  a teenager does and the frame has held up with no issues. If youre looking for a chair that works, although this ,may seem pricey at over a $100, it is well worth it."

"  For the price and features this is a great gaming chair.  We had an issue where the chair arrived on time however my son opened the box for his birthday and it was a wrong, cheaper chair.  Amazon customer service was nice, it took 3 days to get a new one out so for product I rate this a 4, for the hardship of getting the wrong product and lack of actual concession such as a store credit or other discount I give Amazon a 0-1.", "Overall, couple things to review:  Analog audio - I read the specs and understood the inputs are old-school analog.  Our hdtv is 4 year old I looked at the jacks and thought it wouldnt need anything however I did end up having to buy the optical to analog converter for another $25.  I think thats the minus 1 star for me that I had to put out more $ to get the chair to work.  Blu-tooth, etc - super easy to pair my son loves to crank the chair, compatible with any video game system because it wires from the TV, has a base boost we love."

reviews.reviewTitle: Sounds Great - Looks Nice - Easy Setup - Cheap Power Cord
reviews.reviewText: This arrived very quickly and just in time for a birthday thanks to Prime. The unboxing was very easy, and setup was a breeze. However, the item is a bit heavy so if you are unable to lift heavy objects you might need some help. I was a bit concerned that the speakers would not sound good, but was pleasantly surprised. They sound GREAT. The chair is comfortable for varying heights from 5’2” – 5’9” – sorry no 6 footers and up in my home so I’m not sure how comfortable it would be., We connected to an iPhone for music – sounds great. Connected to the TV to watch cable – sounds and works great. Bluetooth – works great, but not with PS4., I would by another., *****UPDATE*******, The power cord stopped working a few weeks ago. Lasted about 10 months and have been trying to find a replacement cord. Ridiculous.

My wife bought this chair for my birthday and at first it was extremely comfortable. Within 3 weeks the padding completely worn down. I have to use a pillow for my back so I am not jabbed by some kind of metal bar in my upper back. Also, I am not rough with the chair at all, and it rarely moves, but somehow everything in the chair(hardware in the seat) moves around every time I lean forward or back. You get what you pay for. I thought I was getting a great deal, but I realize now that we should have paid extra for the quality. I only gave it two stars because it looks nice ad was comfortable when I first got it. In reality though, this thing is garbage.

The X Rocker was everything as advertised. My grandsons just loved them for Christmas.  They could not stop talking about them. The chairs are making their gaming experience fantastic.

Misleading product description.  It says "Built-in bluetooth easily receives audio signals from any bluetooth-enabled device."  This is NOT TRUE.  Sony PS3 is a bluetooth-enabled device but it does not work with PS3.  I have since discovered that X Rocker knows this but they have chosen to not make this clear in the product description.  Yes, the chair works with wires but it is clearly not wireless with the PS3 gaming system.  They should be more clear about this - it feels deceptive.  Other than that, the product seems good.
Works well sounds great would buy again
"  Great quality and sound, even though it isnt wireless, it was a reasonable price bc of that, and my girlfriend hasnt gotten up from the chair in over 24h..should i be worried?!"

I bought this chair because I have a 55" TV and I wanted to sit a little bit closer when I'm gaming. My couch is not quite close enough so I thought this chair might do the trick. Let me start by saying this chair completely blew me away along with my expectations., - The chair is comfortable, I gave it a good hour and a half trial run this afternoon and it felt great. I'm 5'11" and I fit fine in it., - The sound is awesome, much better than I expected., "- Yes, you do have to plug the chair into an outlet and you have to connect it to your tv but its not a big deal. I used the 3.5mm audio out from my tv to connect to the chair.  If youre going to use that option, I recommend a longer cord because the one that comes with the chair is not that long.", "- The Bluetooth function works great, it paired with my iPhone no problem, Im just not certain how I will use it.", "- The only bad thing I have to say about the chair is that its kinda heavy and will be a pain to move around."
Awesome
been a gamer for 8+ years and i love this chair,
Our butts are happy.
As good as advertized.
My son loved it!
Starts of amazingly comfy, but as you wear it out (took less than a month for me) - the padding just vanishes and you are left to sit on the edge of a 2x4 holding the audio connections to the chair.

I bought this gaming chair for my boyfriend for his birthday. I did a lot of research and even asked my gaming friends on which chair I should buy. After much research, I went with this chair, and I'm glad I did. It is easy to assemble- all you do is take it out of the big box and fold it up. Its comfy for a gaming chair and reasonably priced (so I think) for the kind of chair I wanted to buy. Keep in mind, my boyfriend is 5'9" and I'm 5'0 and it fits both of us perfectly. The first night, he played video games for 4 hours and said it was comfy. The best thing about it, the rocking part. It rocks just enough where you don't have that "I'm falling out of my chair feel". As for the sound, we haven't tired that out yet. We hooked it up, and it was easy. I will repost when we figure out the sound.
Bought this for my eight year old son for Christmas. The sound quality is awesome. It is very comfortable and well built.
Got 2 of the, one the sound die on in 2 days, sound is great btw - over all not bad

"  This gaming chair is pretty awesome. Comfortable, good sounding speakers, and I love that it folds up for storing while not in use. The only cons are you cant charge your controller with it (only charges when plugged in to PS3 directly) and there is no catch at the back of the rocking feet, so you can fall back if you get too excited :) Minor cons in all, really happy with this purchase."

The description of this chair led me to believe it was wireless, but it IS NOT.  I got exactly what I did not want.  We have a wire running from this chair over to our TV.  Obviously that is dangerous with children, and has already caused a mishap when one of them tripped over the wire.  When they tripped over the wire it broke off inside the chair, and so now the brand new chair no longer functions with the TV or video game system audio sound., The build quality seems good, and the speakers sounded good while it was working.  The Bluetooth is a very nice feature, which is why we chose this chair over others.  It also has a USB port for charging your iPAD or other device while you sit in the chair., Overall the kids were very excited about this chair, but after they tripped over the wire it is not very useful anymore.
"  Just unpacked it - looks awesome.  Its comfortable and can fold in half.  Only downside I can tell is that its a little heavy.  Sounds great."

features: ROCKER GAMING CHAIR WITH SPEAKERS: Video gaming, race seat designed chair can be used for playing video games, watching movies and TV, listening to music, reading, and relaxing.
IMMERSIVE MEDIA EXPERIENCE: 2 forward facing speakers with powerful subwoofer, provide great sound and a low rumble intensifying your game, movie, or music
WIRELESS BLUETOOTH RECEIVER: Built-in to the chair to play audio wirelessly from any Bluetooth-enabled device
COMFORTABLE DESIGN: Features a padded backrest and arms for a comfortable gaming experience
COMPATIBILITY: Includes most gaming devices & systems, smart devices, TV, CD, DVD, Blu-ray, and MP3 players. Weight capacity: 275 lbs.
productDescription: Upgrade your gaming setup with the X Rocker Surge Wireless Bluetooth 2.1 Sound Video Gaming Floor Chair. Get more out of video games, shows, and movies with the chair's built-in audio system. This captain-style video game chair has 2 speakers and a wide seating area for an immersive video game experience. The chair's extra wide design features mesh material with has an ergonomic design with neck support for superior comfort. The flip-up armrests provide extra support for long campaigns and movies. A built-in control panel includes separate volume and bass controls with input/output jacks for connecting to your audio source and to other chairs for a multiplayer experience. The X Rocker Surge Wireless Bluetooth 2.1 Sound Video Gaming Floor Chair measures 36.81 x 32.28 x 20.89 and includes RCA cables. Founded in 1992, Ace Casual Furniture specializes in furniture designed to fit into your lifestyle. Their top-quality home furnishings are custom made at a price you can afford. The products they use are sourced from around the world, resulting in pieces you can't get anywhere else. Every item they offer combines style and function in an exceptional way.

qAndA.question: Does Bluetooth mean it is wireless?  Buying for my 14 yr. old son. not familiar with gaming chairs.  Looking for something without wires everywhere?

answers.answer:
All of our chairs must be plugged into a power outlet in order to work. As far as the audio portion of it, the Bluetooth chair can be Bluetooth's to iPad, iPod, iPhone, Android phones, etc. The Bluetooth is not capable of being paired to a gaming system, therefore you would have to run the audio cable from your chair t…
        
          see more
        


        All of our chairs must be plugged into a power outlet in order to work. As far as the audio portion of it, the Bluetooth chair can be Bluetooth's to iPad, iPod, iPhone, Android phones, etc. The Bluetooth is not capable of being paired to a gaming system, therefore you would have to run the audio cable from your chair to the gamesystem/television. If a chair is wireless, this refer to a chair that comes with a transmitter box, that you would plug the audio cables into and then run them to your device (television, game system, etc.) compared torunning the audio cable all the way to the chair.
        
          see less

qAndA.question: son weighs210 6ft will this chair work for him

answers.answer: I think so. I am similar size and find it comfortable. But it is my son's chair, and I don't use it as often as he, so not sure how it would hold up if I used it regularly.
Yes it's a wide chair and long it's a great adult size chair

qAndA.question: does any chair fold

answers.answer: How about this chair, does this chair fold?

qAndA.question: Is this compatible with the Xbox One and Wii U?

answers.answer: Yes, but additional cables are needed. For the Xbox One, you will need an HDMI splitter cable to have 2 HDMI outputs and an HDMI to RCA cable. For the Wii U, you will need a video out cable with RCA on the end.

qAndA.question: Is the adapter and hdmi box needed for the chair to work?

answers.answer: Save yourself the trouble, do not purchase this chair, it ended up being such a headache for myself and my kid, we bought an HDMI adapter and a splitter and it still wouldn't work and now it's just a useless piece of furniture we can't do anything with! Please purchase a different chair.

answers.answer: I don't think it would be tall enough of a desk top. It sits very low to the ground and personally, I would not like it if I used my desktop with it.

qAndA.question: Does the chair fold in half?

answers.answer: Yes the chair does fold in half.  There is a pin as well as velcro that secures the seat when you open it up all the way.

qAndA.question: Will it topple backwards ?

answers.answer: It’s actually kind of difficult to flip backwards unintentially. It’s well built to stay in an upright position.

Feel free to contact service@acecasual.com for any questions or concerns

qAndA.question: Why can you not have a microphone headset plugged in to chair?!

answers.answer:
If you are wanting to chat with other online gamers, then you would need to connect the headset into the game system as normal.  If you connect a headset into the headset port on the chair, this will only re-route the sound from the chairs speakers to the headset.  The chair does not have a mic, so unfortunately you ca…
        
          see more
        


        If you are wanting to chat with other online gamers, then you would need to connect the headset into the game system as normal.  If you connect a headset into the headset port on the chair, this will only re-route the sound from the chairs speakers to the headset.  The chair does not have a mic, so unfortunately you cannot chat with others.
